Every two weeks, we'll post a curated list of open Product Leadership Roles at leading companies to help people actively looking for jobs.

For context: I run Supra, a private community of high-caliber product leaders, so I have access to roles our community members are hiring for and jobs posted in our job openings Slack channel. Here are the most interesting roles:

Thanks for reading Supra Insights! Subscribe for free to receive new posts.

Our community continues to help members land promotions, solve their challenges faster, and network with other ambitious product leaders.
